name: A Tale of Pirates: a Dummy Mutiny
description: A Tale of Pirates: A Dummy Mutiny is a piratey shooter in Virtuarr Reality. Put on your high-tech eyepatch and shoot down countless dummies in the dummiest mutiny in the history of Caribbeans.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7-4790, AMD Ryzen 5 1500X equivalent or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 8GB / AMD RX Vega 56 8GB equivalent or better Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
